title: Understanding Get & Transform
text: The Get & Transform command in data processing tools allows you to do more than just import data. Think about what additional capabilities it might offer.

title: Editing and Querying Data
text: Consider how Get & Transform might allow you to interact with the data. Does it let you edit, query, or transform the data in any way?

title: Permanent Changes
text: Does using Get & Transform make permanent changes to the original data, or does it allow you to work with the data in a different way?

hintAnswer: allows us to edit, as well as query or transform, imported data without making a permanent change to the data
title: Features of Get & Transform
text: What are the key features of the Get & Transform command that differentiate it from other data import methods?
choices: allows us to edit, as well as query or transform, imported data without making a permanent change to the data
there is no difference from other ways
it allows you to edit, but not query or transform, imported data without making a permanent change
